This will be used to document the YMSG16 protocol
<wiki:toc max_depth="1" />

=== Authentication ===

Authentication is done in 3 stages:
  * Packet is sent to yahoo requesting a login
  * HTTPS request is made to server with the username, password and key form the socket
  * The https returns cookie values used for the rest of login.
